name: Name
delete_last_session_desc: You'll not be able to reconnect to the same session again. Only delete if your rejoin token has expired or the session has ended.
error_failed_to_rejoin_socket: Failed to reconnect to your last server, this can either be a connection error or your session has expired since you left the game.
error_failed_to_rejoin_game_token_invali: Failed to join the lobby: Your game session token is invalid or has expired.
error_failed_to_rejoin_game_doesnt_exist: Failed to join the lobby: The lobby doesn't exist anymore, the owner may have closed it.
error_failed_to_rejoin_player_wasnt_on_l: Failed to join the lobby: You weren't even on this lobby.
error_failed_to_rejoin_still_playing: Failed to join the lobby: A player with this name is still online on this game.
error_failed_to_rejoin_moved_on: Failed to join the lobby: The lobby owner decided to move on with the game without you, such is life man.
error_failed_to_rejoin_other: Failed to join the lobby: Unknown reason.
